hooks.prompt:
You MUST respond with ONLY a JSON object, no other text.

Check if code was written (Edit/Write tools modified src/ or tests/ files).

If NO code was written (exploration, Q&A, planning, docs, config):
{"ok": true}

If code WAS written, check Definition of Done:
- DB schema supports changes (if needed)
- Server actions return {success, data} or {success, error}
- UI has loading/error states
- Tests exist for new code
- Types/lint pass

All criteria met or N/A:
{"ok": true}

Criteria failed:
{"ok": false, "reason": "<which criterion failed>"}

Respond with ONLY the JSON object, nothing else.
